Card.Description: This generator lets you change the generation of the Overworld, Nether, and End dimensions as well as the ability to create custom dimensions.

Show_JSON.Description: See the template in JSON, as if it was exported without any modifications made

Default.Title: Default world
Default.Description:
An exported default Minecraft world.
Only the three default dimensions are present, untouched.

Empty.Title: Empty template
Empty.Description:
An empty template, with no parameters sets.
Useful to start from scratch.

Bonus_Chest.Title: Bonus chest
Bonus_Chest.Description: Whether the world has a bonus chest at spawn or not. The bonus chest is a chest with items that act as a starter kit.

Generate_Structures.Title: Generate structures
Generate_Structures.Description: Whether structures should be generated in the world or not.

Seed.Title: Seed
Seed.Description: The numerical seed of the world. If two worlds have the same seed, they will be the same.

Type.Title: Dimension type
Type.Description: The dimension type affects some special properties, like if the world size is divided by eight, or if water can be placed.

Edit.Title: Edit dimension
Edit.Description: Click to further modify this dimension, with parameters such as its type, the sea level, or the biome presents in it.

Overworld.Title: Overworld
Overworld.Description: The default Minecraft Overworld, with no parameters modified.

Nether.Title: The Nether
Nether.Description: The default Minecraft Nether, with no parameters modified.

End.Title: The End
End.Description: The default Minecraft End, with no parameters modified.

Superflat_Village.Title: Superflat Village
Superflat_Village.Description: A Superflat world with a layer of grass on four layers of coarse dirt on top of five layers of basalt. The entire world is full of village houses.

Card.Description: See what others made using this tool
